description:
EY Academy of Business has opened the vacancy of Intern to DipIFR project with involvement in the following activities:

 
Accounting: 
  • Maintenance of CRM (Client Relationship Management) database
  • Invoices preperation, receivables follow-up
  • Contact preparation and handling
  • Other accounting duties. 
 
Administration:
  • General administration: correspondence, filling, handling client calls
  • Assistance with the seminar logistics
  • Providing support for clients over the phone
 
Requirements:
  • The minimum internship period - 12 months
  • Fourth-, or fifth-year student, undergraduate
  • Excellent computer skills (MS Office, Internet)
  • Ability to work flexible working hours
name: Intern to Academy of Business
